name: Mountain Massage
text: Looking to unwind from everyday stress or a day on the slopes? Mountain Massage, committed to health and relaxation, is located right at the resort and is open to the public as well as the members and guests of Split Rock Resort. This Poconos massage center offers an eclectic mix of massage and bodywork services to help you rejuvenate. Packages and gift certificates are available. Book Now: mountain-massage.com
schedule:
Sun - Thurs: 10am-4pm
Fri - Sat: 10am-7pm
Other appointment times may be available by request.
